Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Spatial \Spa"tial\, a. Of or pertaining to space. ``Spatial quantity and relations.'' --L. H. Atwater. [1913 Webster]

spatial adj : pertaining to or involving or having the nature of space; "the first dimension to concentrate on is the spatial one"; "spatial ability"; "spatial awareness"; "the spatial distribution of the population" [syn: {spacial}] [ant: {nonspatial}]
